title: Drawing, "Furniture Designs, Modern", early 20th century
medium: Graphite, red, green and blue pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Partial stamp due to tear, in black ink at lower right: DONAL...
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower margin: MODERN UPHOLSTERY[erased] LINE JAN 1936 Inscribed in red pencil at upper left: E-2; at middle left: E-1; upper half of sheet: x x x x x/x x x x x x/x x x x x x Inscribed in graphite with design numbers throughout Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout
description: 8 chairs, 7 cabinets, 5 chests of drawers, 5 tables, 2 beds, 2 dressing tables, 2 end tables, 1 ottoman Deskey numbers reading from upper left vertically: 9040, 9009, 9041, 9042, 9043

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Furniture Designs, Modern", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite, red, green and blue pencil on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-183.
